name: QUAR: INFERNAL MACHINES
description:
Quar: Infernal Machines is a turn-based strategy game set in the world of Alwyd!
Command cavalry to sweep the enemy’s flanks. Send armoured tractors forward to shatter hardened defences. Your soldiers are armed with weapons ranging from the humble rifle to heavy-automatic shotguns. Rely on your officers to keep up your troop’s morale and to call in deadly airstrikes.

• PlayStation® VR compatible including Move Controller support!
• More than 12 levels in which to fight for the Crusader cause!
• 18 different friendly and enemy units! From infantry to cavalry and armoured tractors to snipers and heavy-automatic shotguns!
• A living, breathing upgradeable base fully populated with troops going about their business! Upgrade your mechanic’s bay for better tractors. Upgrade the mess hall (and its food!) for better morale and get that hanger built so you can call in air-strikes!
• Interact with your units from a top-down view or shrink yourself down to soldier size to see the action first hand!



3D Display with compatible 3D glasses (sold separately) required for 3D features.

1 player
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
3D Game
PlayStation®VR Compatible
PlayStation®Camera Compatible
Enhanced play with 2 PS®Move controllers
